translocatorlocatorredux:translocator_fl: A suspiciously helpful little device. Makes finding Translocators much easier.
translocatorlocatorredux:translocator_cu: There are no broken translocators within #range blocks of that block.
There is #no broken translocator within #range blocks of that block.
There are #no broken translocators within #range blocks of that block!
translocatorlocatorredux:translocator_co: There is no broken translocator within #range blocks #direction.
There is #no broken translocator within #range blocks #direction.
There are #no broken translocators within #range blocks #direction!
translocatorlocatorredux:agedwood_flavor: A suspiciously helpful little device. Makes finding ancient ruins much easier.
translocatorlocatorredux:agedwood_cubefo: There are no ancient ruins within #range blocks of that block.
The device has found traces of ancient ruins within #range blocks of that block!
translocatorlocatorredux:agedwood_conefo: There are no ancient ruins within #range blocks #direction.
The device has found traces of ancient ruins within #range blocks #direction!
translocatorlocatorredux:config-aw-use-c: If enabled, the crafting recipe uses cupronickel plates instead of iron plates. Requires a world/server restart.
